dict.acceptation: 愚蠢的；迟钝的；乏味的；晕眩的，昏迷不醒的；

sent.orig: Neurosis essentially consists of stupid behavior by non-stupid people.
sent.trans: 神经官能症本质上是由来自不愚蠢人的愚蠢行为组成的。

sent.orig: Forrest: Momma says that stupid is as stupid does.
sent.trans: 弗瑞斯特：妈妈说傻人有傻福。

sent.orig: Stupid isn't afraid fall, Stupid knows there are worse things than failure like not even trying.
sent.trans: 笨蛋不怕失败，因为他们知道有一种东西比失败更糟，那就是——连试都不去试。

sent.orig: Calculate to the person also unimportant with the stupid stupid impression.
sent.trans: 就算给人以蠢笨的印象也不要紧。

sent.orig: You are an idiot. You stupid, stupid fool.
sent.trans: 你是个白痴。你这个愚蠢到家的笨蛋。
